yaml_mode_deprecated.description:
The `mode` option in `lovelace:` configuration is deprecated and will be removed in Home Assistant 2026.8.

To migrate:

1. Remove `mode: yaml` from `lovelace:` in your `configuration.yaml`
2. If you have `resources:` declared in your lovelace configuration, add `resource_mode: yaml` to keep loading resources from YAML
3. Add a dashboard entry in your `configuration.yaml`:

   ```yaml
   lovelace:
     resource_mode: yaml  # Add this if you have resources declared
     dashboards:
       lovelace:
         mode: yaml
         filename: {config_file}
         title: Overview
         icon: mdi:view-dashboard
         show_in_sidebar: true
   ```

4. Restart Home Assistant
